A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Extremely disappointed. Don’t trust fake profile reviews. Mostly with how they portrayed Luke. For someone who was excited for his return it was painful and disappointing to see him milk a nipple and basically be crazy the entire movie and SERIOUSLY the Luke who never gave up on Vader is going to kill his nephew!! Sorry Mark Hamil. You ruined Luke Disney. Also the humor was painful at times and seemed like a marvel movie rather than true Star Wars. Saddest thing is this can’t be undone.
